decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is occupied.

Condition : 3 - The premises shall be used for an Ismaili Jamatkhana and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).

Condition : 4 - Religious and community activities and meetings, including the use of 
external amplification and speakers, shall not take place anywhere on the site except within the building hereby permitted
Condition : 5 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - Before the development hereby approved is commenced, a scheme for protecting the existing residential properties from external noise, including details of acoustic fencing, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority and any works which form part of such a scheme shall be completed before any part of the development is first used.

Condition : 7 - The building shall be adapted so as to provide sound insulation to prevent the emission of noise outside the buildings above 30dBA (the ambient noise level) with windows shut and other mean of ventilation provided

Condition : 8 - The use shall not commence until a scheme for the ventilation of the premises of an appropriate outlet level, including details of sound attenuation for any necessary plant and the standard or dilution expected has been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 9 - The parking, loading and turning spaces shown on drawing No. 1520-3B received 31.7.03 shall be constructed and available for use before first occupation of any part of the development and such spaces shall not be used for any other purposes.

Condition : 10 - Before the development hereby permitted is commenced a scheme indicating the provision to be made for disabled people to gain access to the Jamatkhana shall have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The agreed scheme shall be implemented before the development hereby permitted is brought into use.

Condition : 11 - The occupier shall submit a Green Travel Plan and car park management plan to the Local Planning Authority and these shall be approved in writing prior to first occupation of the building. The Green Travel Plan and car park management plan as approved to be implemented and thereafter retained

Condition : 12 - 12.	Details of any floodlighting shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is occupied in connection with the use hereby permitted. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 13 - 13.	Prior to first occupation of the building in connection with the use hereby permitted, there shall be submitted to the Council a list of festival days for the remainder of the calendar year. The list submitted shall include details of the activities which will be undertaken on each individual festival day, and the means by which the potential effects of such activities on nearby residential properties and the locality in general are to be mitigated, including traffic management measures and parking arrangements
description: Change of use from the exisitng office use to use as an Ismaili Jamatkhana and Centre
